---
id: stop-cdn-record
title: "StopCDNRecord"
description: "调用本接口停止 CDN 录制。相关回调请参考[录制文件生成回调](/real-time-video-server/callback/cdn/cdn-record-completed)。"
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/zh/server/api-reference/cdn/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StopCDNRecord</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


调用本接口停止 CDN 录制。相关回调请参考[录制文件生成回调](/real-time-video-server/callback/cdn/cdn-record-completed)。

<Note title="调用频率限制">同一个 AppID 下所有房间：20 次/秒</Note>

## Request

获取。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureNonce","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。16 位 16
